description:
Known for success in personal injury matters, Legal Defenders is a law firm where clients come first. We are based in Glendale, California, and have a reputation for exceptional customer service. The benefits of working with our team include conveniences such as the following:

• Four locations
• Free initial consultations
• Virtual appointments available
• No fee collected unless we win
We opened our law firm with the intention of guiding clients through dark moments and into a brighter future. Our attorneys have handled more than 10,000 cases involving issues such as car accidents, dog bites and medical malpractice. With more than 90 years of experience among us, we know precisely how to build a case that targets maximum compensation. In fact, we have returned more than $350 million to people who have suffered the unthinkable.
Our track record is impeccable, as we have a 99% success rate. This holds true in negotiations as well as litigation. Our attorneys are fearless when taking on defendants like insurance providers. Along the way, we remain compassionate toward clients of our law firm and committed to their recovery. We are available to respond to concerns and give people peace of mind. Legal Defenders accepts credit cards.
